description: This file defines a React functional component named ConfirmDialog, which renders a modal dialog for user confirmation actions such as deletion. It accepts props to control its visibility, display content, and handle user interactions.

methods.name: ConfirmDialog({ open, title, message, onCancel, onConfirm })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a confirmation dialog modal. It displays a title and message, and provides 'Cancel' and action buttons, with handlers passed via props.

ctags.name: ConfirmDialog
ctags.pattern: /^export default function ConfirmDialog({ open, title, message, onCancel, onConfirm }) {$/
